means: （使）潜入水中，淹没( submerge的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Most of the mouth of the cave was submerged in the lake.
sentence.Network_cn: 洞口大半都淹没在湖里。

sentence.Network_en: My right toe struck against a submerged rock.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的右脚趾踢到水中的一块石头上了。

sentence.Network_en: The car was submerged under 20 feet of water.

entry.tran: 在水中的;淹没的;水下的
entry.def: If something is submerged, it is below the surface of some water.

example.ex: My right toe struck against a submerged rock...
example.tran: 我的右脚趾踢到水中的一块石头上了。

example.ex: Most of the mouth of the cave was submerged in the lake.
example.tran: 洞口大半都淹没在湖里。

means.word_mean: 1. under water; e.g. at the bottom of a body of water;
2. beneath the surface of the water;

sentences.sentence: "viewing subaqueous fauna from a glass-bottomed boat"

auth_sentence.content: Slowdance is like hearing New Order submerged in treacle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Slowdance is like hearing New Order submerged in treacle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Slowdance is like hearing New Order submerged in treacle.

auth_sentence.content: Planning for his trip to Peking...soon submerged other considerations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Planning for his trip to Peking...soon submerged other considerations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Planning for his trip to Peking...soon submerged other considerations.

auth_sentence.content: Pour vinegar in until the eggs are completely submerged.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pour vinegar in until the eggs are completely submerged.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pour vinegar in until the eggs are completely submerged.

Sentence.sentence: The whole Antarctic region will be submerged.

means.word_mean: 在水中的;淹没的;水下的;水下运动的

sentences.en: The car was submerged under 20 feet of water.
sentences.cn: 汽车沉在水下20 英尺处。

sentences.en: I am absolutely submerged in work.
sentences.cn: 我完全沉浸在工作之中了。

sentences.en: I was submerged in reading an exciting book,and didn’t hear the doorbell ring.
sentences.cn: 我正在全神贯注地看一本极有趣的书,没听见门铃响。
